languages.text: "Жуткое искажение облика человека! Похоже, они передают свою отраву укусом, подчиняя жертв. Некоторые из них неотличимы от нормальных людей, другие омерзительно уродливы — еретики скрывают их от чужих глаз. Они, похоже, объединены единым разумом и абсолютно преданы презренному культу! Хормейстер астропатов Даргонуса предположил, что это они стоят за мором псайкеров на планете — он различает призрак некоего мощного сознания".

"A horrendous distortion of the human form! It seems that they spread their poison by biting and enslaving their victims. Some of them are indistinguishable from normal humans, while others are disgustingly ugly — the heretics hide them away from prying eyes. They seem to be connected by a common consciousness and are absolutely loyal to the despicable cult! The Astropathic Choirmaster of Dargonus has suggested that the cult may be behind the extermination of the psykers on the planet — he can sense the ghost of a powerful consciousness of some sort."
languages.original_text: "Жуткое искажение облика человека! Похоже, они передают свою отраву укусом, подчиняя жертв. Некоторые из них неотличимы от нормальных людей, другие омерзительно уродливы — еретики скрывают их от чужих глаз. Они, похоже, объединены единым разумом и абсолютно преданы презренному культу! Хормейстер астропатов Даргонуса предположил, что это они стоят за мором псайкеров на планете — он различает призрак некоего мощного сознания".

traits.locale_text: "A horrendous distortion of the human image! It seems that spread their poison by biting and enslaving the victims. Some of them are indistinguishable from normal humans, while others are disgustingly ugly — the heretics hide them away from prying eyes. They seem to be connected by a hivemind and are absolutely loyal to the despicable cult! The Astropath Choirmaster of Dargonus had suggested that the cult may be behind the extermination of the psykers on the planet — he can sense a ghost of a powerful consciousness of some sort."

languages.text: “那简直是对人类形象的可怕歪曲！那些变种人似乎是通过叮咬、奴役受害者，传播他们的瘟疫。他们之中的一部分人与正常人毫无区别，而另一部分则丑陋得令人作呕。那些异端分子把丑陋的人隐藏起来，避免外界窥视。他们似乎是被某种共同意识联系在一起，对他们的邪教领袖绝对忠诚！达戈努斯星语唱诗班的大师感觉到了某种拥有强大意识的幽灵。他认为，达戈努斯之前的星语者之所以发了疯，真正的原因很可能就是这个邪教。”
languages.original_text: "A horrendous distortion of the human form! It seems that they spread their poison by biting and enslaving their victims. Some of them are indistinguishable from normal humans, while others are disgustingly ugly — the heretics hide them away from prying eyes. They seem to be connected by a common consciousness and are absolutely loyal to the despicable cult! The Astropathic Choirmaster of Dargonus has suggested that the cult may be behind the extermination of the psykers on the planet — he can sense the ghost of a powerful consciousness of some sort."

“那简直是对人类形象的可怕扭曲！那些变种人似乎是通过叮咬、奴役受害者，传播他们的瘟疫。他们之中的一部分人与正常人毫无区别，而另一部分则丑陋得令人作呕。那些异端分子把丑陋的人隐藏起来，避免外界窥视。他们似乎是被某种共同意识联系在一起，对他们的邪教领袖绝对忠诚！达戈努斯星语唱诗班的大师感觉到了某种拥有强大意识的幽灵。他认为，达戈努斯之前的星语者之所以发了疯，真正的原因很可能就是这个邪教。”

languages.text: «¡Una horrenda distorsión de la imagen humana! Parece que propagan su veneno mordiendo y esclavizando a las víctimas. Algunos de ellos son idénticos a los humanos normales, mientras que otros son terriblemente grotescos; a esos, los herejes los ocultan de miradas indiscretas. ¡Parecen estar conectados por una conciencia común y son absolutamente leales al despreciable culto! El Maestro del Coro de Astrópatas de Dargonus ha sugerido que el culto podría estar detrás del exterminio de los psíquicos del planeta. Puede sentir la presencia de una poderosa conciencia de algún tipo».
languages.original_text: "A horrendous distortion of the human form! It seems that they spread their poison by biting and enslaving their victims. Some of them are indistinguishable from normal humans, while others are disgustingly ugly — the heretics hide them away from prying eyes. They seem to be connected by a common consciousness and are absolutely loyal to the despicable cult! The Astropathic Choirmaster of Dargonus has suggested that the cult may be behind the extermination of the psykers on the planet — he can sense the ghost of a powerful consciousness of some sort."

traits.locale_text: «¡Una horrenda distorsión de la imagen humana! Parece que propagan su veneno mordiendo y esclavizando a las víctimas. Algunos de ellos son idénticos a los humanos normales, mientras que otros son terriblemente grotescos; a esos, los herejes los ocultan de miradas indiscretas. ¡Parecen estar conectados por una conciencia común y son absolutamente leales al despreciable culto! El Maestro del Coro de Astrópatas de Dargonus ha sugerido que el culto podría estar detrás del exterminio de los psíquicos del planeta. Puede sentir la presencia de una poderosa conciencia de algún tipo».

languages.text: 「人間の形をした恐ろしいディストーションだ！奴らは犠牲者に食らいつき、奴隷にすることで毒を撒き散らすようだ。普通の人間と見分けがつかないものもいれば、不快なほど醜いものもいる...異端者たちはそれを詮索好きな目から隠しているが、奴らは共通の意識でつながっており、卑劣な魔女団に絶対的な忠誠を誓っているらしいぞ！ダルゴナスの感応通信聖歌隊の隊長は、この惑星の異能者根絶の背後に魔女団が関与していると仄めかしている...彼はある種の強力な意識の霊を感じることができるからな」
languages.original_text: "A horrendous distortion of the human form! It seems that they spread their poison by biting and enslaving their victims. Some of them are indistinguishable from normal humans, while others are disgustingly ugly — the heretics hide them away from prying eyes. They seem to be connected by a common consciousness and are absolutely loyal to the despicable cult! The Astropathic Choirmaster of Dargonus has suggested that the cult may be behind the extermination of the psykers on the planet — he can sense the ghost of a powerful consciousness of some sort."

「人間の形をした恐ろしいディストーションだ！奴らは犠牲者に食らいつき、奴隷にすることで毒を撒き散らすようだ。普通の人間と見分けがつかないものもいれば、不快なほど醜いものもいる...異端者たちはそれを詮索好きな目から隠しているが、奴らは共通の意識でつながっており、卑劣な魔女団に絶対的な忠誠を誓っているらしいぞ！ダルゴナスの感応通信聖歌隊の隊長は、この惑星の異能者根絶の背後に魔女団が関与していると仄めかしている...彼はある種の強力な意識の霊を感じることができるからな」

languages.text: « Une atroce version dénaturée du corps humain ! Apparemment, ils répandent leur poison en mordant et en asservissant leurs victimes. Certains ressemblent à des humains normaux, mais d'autres sont réellement hideux... Ceux-là, les hérétiques les gardent d'ailleurs loin des regards. En tous cas, ils semblent tous liés entre eux par une conscience commune et sont extrêmement fidèles à cette maudite secte ! D'après le maître du chœur astropathique de Dargonus, c'est probablement ce culte qui se cache derrière l'extermination des psykers de la planète. Il arrive à percevoir le fantôme d'une puissante conscience. »
languages.original_text: "A horrendous distortion of the human form! It seems that they spread their poison by biting and enslaving their victims. Some of them are indistinguishable from normal humans, while others are disgustingly ugly — the heretics hide them away from prying eyes. They seem to be connected by a common consciousness and are absolutely loyal to the despicable cult! The Astropathic Choirmaster of Dargonus has suggested that the cult may be behind the extermination of the psykers on the planet — he can sense the ghost of a powerful consciousness of some sort."

traits.locale_text: « Une atroce version dénaturée du corps humain ! Apparemment, ils répandent leur poison en mordant et en asservissant leurs victimes. Certains ressemblent à des humains normaux, mais d'autres sont réellement hideux... Ceux-là, les hérétiques les gardent d'ailleurs loin des regards. En tous cas, ils semblent tous liés entre eux par une conscience commune et sont extrêmement fidèles à cette maudite secte ! D'après le maître du chœur astropathique de Dargonus, c'est probablement ce culte qui se cache derrière l'extermination des psykers de la planète. Il arrive à percevoir le fantôme d'une puissante conscience. »

languages.text: "Eine grauenhafte Verzerrung des menschlichen Antlitzes! Es scheint, als würden sie ihr Gift verbreiten, indem sie die Opfer beißen und versklaven. Einige lassen sich nicht von normalen Menschen unterscheiden, andere sind widerwärtig hässlich ... die Ketzer verbergen sie vor neugierigen Blicken. Sie scheinen durch ein gemeinsames Bewusstsein miteinander verbunden zu sein und sind dem schändlichen Kult vollkommen treu ergeben! Der Meister des astropathischen Chors von Dargonus mutmaßt, dass der Kult hinter der Auslöschung der Psioniker auf dem Planeten stehen könnte. Er spürt den Geist eines mysteriösen mächtigen Bewusstseins."
languages.original_text: "A horrendous distortion of the human form! It seems that they spread their poison by biting and enslaving their victims. Some of them are indistinguishable from normal humans, while others are disgustingly ugly — the heretics hide them away from prying eyes. They seem to be connected by a common consciousness and are absolutely loyal to the despicable cult! The Astropathic Choirmaster of Dargonus has suggested that the cult may be behind the extermination of the psykers on the planet — he can sense the ghost of a powerful consciousness of some sort."

"Eine grauenhafte Verzerrung des menschlichen Ebenbilds! Es scheint, als würden sie ihr Gift verbreiten, indem sie die Opfer beißen und versklaven. Einige lassen sich nicht von normalen Menschen unterscheiden, andere sind widerwärtig hässlich — die Ketzer verbergen sie vor neugierigen Blicken. Sie scheinen durch ein gemeinsames Bewusstsein miteinander verbunden zu sein und sind dem schändlichen Kult vollkommen treu ergeben! Der Meister des astropathischen Chors von Dargonus mutmaßt, dass der Kult hinter der Auslöschung der Psioniker auf dem Planeten stehen könnte. Er spürt den Geist eines mysteriösen mächtigen Bewusstseins."

languages.text: "İnsan formunun korkunç bir şekilde bozunumu! Görünüşe göre kurbanlarını ısırıp kontrol altına alarak zehirlerini yayıyorlar. Bazılarını normal insanlardan ayırt etmek mümkün değilken diğerlerinde mide bulandırıcı bir çirkinlik hâkim. Kâfirler, bu ikinci grubu meraklı gözlerden saklıyorlar. Ortak bir zihinle birbirlerine bağlı ve bu alçak tarikata körü körüne sadık gibi görünüyor! Dargonus'un Astropatik Koro Şefi, gezegendeki ruhsezerlerin ortadan kaldırılmasının ardında tarikatın olabileceğini düşünüyor. Bir tür zihin gücünün ruhunu hissedebiliyormuş."
languages.original_text: "A horrendous distortion of the human form! It seems that they spread their poison by biting and enslaving their victims. Some of them are indistinguishable from normal humans, while others are disgustingly ugly — the heretics hide them away from prying eyes. They seem to be connected by a common consciousness and are absolutely loyal to the despicable cult! The Astropathic Choirmaster of Dargonus has suggested that the cult may be behind the extermination of the psykers on the planet — he can sense the ghost of a powerful consciousness of some sort."
